subject: World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: As corruption allegations in the selection process mount, some are seeking a postponement of the vote on Thursday for the 2018 and 2022 soccer tournament hosts.
snippet: As corruption allegations in the selection process mount, some are seeking a postponement of the vote on Thursday for the 2018 and 2022 soccer tournament hosts.
